Articles.Content:
This challenge is simple. Go to any planet you wish and do stunts with any rover you made. The coolest stunt will be determined by me. 

Requriements

No infinite fuel or other cheats.

no rocket or jet engines

rcs is allowed 

don't copy other people.

for me to count yours you must post a download to the video or a link to YouTube or a video on the post.

must be done on land

using Easter eggs is allowed but using terrain glitches is not. (Keep in mind the mohole is an Easter egg and the gaping hole in the surface on Minmus is a terrain glitch)

some suggestions

1.keep the car light

2.to get better stunts try your stunt in low gravity like on Minmus

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-22T23:14:13Z" title="06/22/2015 11:14  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 22, 2015</time> by 322997am**
Give them some time, guy. Takes a while to make a rover and fly it somewhere. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
